english_example_sentence: If we had received this important news, we would have acted immediately.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы получили эту важную новость, мы бы действовали немедленно.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz bu önemli haberi almışsak, hemen harekete geçerdik.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz bu önemli haberi ______, hemen harekete geçerdik.
